Header: Father and daughter die in three wheeler accident
Content: Father and daughter have died and the mother has seriously injured in an accident near Thittawella Tank in Kurunegala. A motorcar moving towards Kurunegala from Wariyapola on Kurunegala â€“ Puttalama main road has collided with a three wheeler coming from the opposite side. The son and the two year daughter in the three wheeler have died and the mother has been admitted to the Kurunegala District Hospital with serious injuries. Police said the accident had occurred due to the excessive speed of the three wheeler.
